page.title: 16TOURISM
page.content: Aberaeron is still quite uncommercialized with a very attractive harbour.The character of the town,especially the house types,is a very important tourist attraction. Domestic visitors represent the most important component of tourism.A number of tourists were interviewed. They all found Aberaeron extremely attractive and liked it very much.Over half had been before and only 2 out of 16 said they would not come again. The sea,the quiet,and the scenery were the main attractions and of the 16 interveiwed, 6 came from the Midlands,4 from the South West,2 from Liverpool, and the rest from Wales. Tourism is vital to the economy of Aberaeron and is becoming busier every year.More shops were turning towards the holiday trade and it is extremely crowded during July and August.
